instructions: Image titled View Browsing History Step 6 1 Open Google Chrome. It's a white app with the Chrome icon on it. Image titled View Browsing History Step 7 2 Tap . This icon is in the top-right corner of the screen. Image titled View Browsing History Step 8 3 Tap . It's near the middle of the menu. Image titled View Browsing History Step 9 4 Review your browsing history. Tapping a history item will take you to its page. To clear your browsing history, tap Clear Browsing Data... in the bottom-left corner (or at the top of the page on Android), make sure "Browsing History" is checked, and tap Clear Browsing Data (or CLEAR DATA on Android) twice. Image titled View Browsing History Step 16 1 Open Firefox. It's the blue globe with an orange fox icon. Image titled View Browsing History Step 17 2 Tap . This is in the bottom-right corner of the screen. A pop-up window will appear. On Android, tap in the top-right corner of the screen to prompt a drop-down menu. Image titled View Browsing History Step 18 3 Tap . It's in the menu. Doing so opens your Firefox mobile history page. Image titled View Browsing History Step 19 4 Review your Firefox history. Tapping an item will open it in Firefox, while swiping left over an item will remove it from your browsing history. To clear your entire Firefox history, tap or , tap Settings , tap Clear Private Data , tap Clear Private Data (iPhone) or Clear now (Android), and tap OK (iPhone) or CLEAR DATA (Android).
